entity.name: Betsy DeVos
entity.description: US Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos

text: @realDonaldTrump DeVos, one of the more dreadful people in Trump’s clown car cabinet of sycophants has used the distraction of 116,000 dead Americans from COVID-19 to quietly push ahead in transforming the nation’s public education system into a Third World classroom the envy of Trump University.
